attributes.action: PROTECT THE SPORT OF COURSE, GAME AND SEA FISHING FROM BEING BANNED
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
THIS PETITION IS FOR THE PROTECTION OF THE SPORT OF COURSE, GAME AND SEA FISHING FROM BEING BANNED.
LET THE GOVERNMENT KNOW, THAT WE THE ANGLER IN OUR MILLIONS, WISH THE GOVERNENMENT TO LOOK AT PROTECTING A SPORT THAT HAS BEEN PART OF OUR HERITAGE FOR CENTURIES.
NOT ONLY IS IT OUR HERITAGE, BUT IT IS POSSIBLY THE ONLY PARTISIPATION SPORT THAT PAYS FOR AND HELPS PROTECT THE ENVIRONMENT IN WHICH  IT IS DONE WITH THE PURCHASE OF AN ENVIRONMENT FISHING LICENCE.
ALSO IT IS ONLY ONE OF A FEW PARTISIPATION SPORTS THAT CAN BE ENJOYED BY ANY PERSON REGARDLESS OF AGE, RACE, WEALTH AND TO A LARGE DEGREE DISSABILITY.

rejection.details: Please resubmit without the excessive use of capital letters. They make the petition very hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
